title: Bug 102623: Image can't be refreshed after importing again.
description: When importing a new image into the layout again, the image does not get refreshed. The original image continues to be displayed instead of the newly imported image.
OB: When importing a new image 'image1.jpg' into the layout again, the expected result is that the new image is displayed. However, the actual result is that the original image is still displayed.
EB:
To reproduce this issue: 
1. Import the new image 'image1.jpg' into the layout again.

Expected result: The new image is displayed.

Actual result: The original image is still displayed.
SR: The software should properly refresh the image after importing a new image into the layout again.
